website_summaries.verdict: A feature-rich, well-made model that delivers excellent magnifications and a decent price.
pros: Earns praise for producing crisp, clear images that rival magnifiers that are much more expensive
Built-in light enhances viewing of the screen
Has a handle and video output port
cons: Some reports of malfunctions, such as units that fail to charge or hold a charge and broken buttons

customer_reviews.title: It is the best buy I know of
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth magnifier. The first two stopped working in less than two years. No. 3 still works ok and the Koolertron was intended to be a backup for that. But, at one third of the price, the Koolertron outperforms it. It has a sharper display, more features, feels solid without being heavy and is simple and convenient to use. So, no. 3 has been demoted to backup and the Koolertron is definitely my no. 1 and would have no reservations in recommending it to anyone. It is the best buy I know of.
customer_reviews.author: UniSeeker

customer_reviews.title: We've tried other handheld magnifiers but this one is the best one yet for the value
customer_reviews.text: My dad is 93 and has macular degeneration. We've tried other handheld magnifiers but this one is the best one yet for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Barmes

customer_reviews.title: Great help for low vision.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice device. The handle makes it very easy to use. Voice on buttons helps to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well affordable portable CCTV with HDMI capability
customer_reviews.text: This item is very much indispensable for me. It does the job and I only had to spend $190 for it. And if you're on a budget or you just don't want to be Gau just in your blind or low vision this is the thing to get. You won't be sent to the poor house when you have to buy one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Handheld portable magnifier
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend who is losing his vision. He takes this everywhere! I even had to make him a special pouch for it. He can now read menus easily and price tags and any other close reading tasks. It has been a very useful tool for him.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaB

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend who has failing eyesight. He has had trouble for some time and couldn’t read hardly at all. With this digital magnifier, he says things are so much easier to read. He actually uses it to read books he couldn’t read before. This is a great device and a wonderful help for those with failing eyesight.
customer_reviews.author: LadySherlock

customer_reviews.title: Far camera is horrible
customer_reviews.text: It works great for reading small print, etc, though it would be great to start from x2. It's horrible though for the far objects. You can't magnify anything using that. The cam quality is just too bad. It works as a magnifier. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: maha

customer_reviews.title: Device works, instructions in super small print with lots of typos
customer_reviews.text: The device works well to magnify text, but my father had to get my help setting it up and installing the battery, because the set-up and use instructions were in very small type with lots of typos. Given that this is a product for vision-impaired people, you should have a big easy to read initial set-up and use guide.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Heinen

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Even for someone who is technicalogically challenged
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Even for someone who is technicalogically challenged, this was easy to set up and use. It's been very helpful for my uncle, who has macular degeneration, to read his mail and the morning paper. The only thing that would be better is easier to identify buttons, but he's still able to figure them out.
customer_reviews.author: Shining Star

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my son who vision problems. He loves it. Thanks for the fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: I am almost blind and need it to read any print. I can make it as large as I need. It is small enough to just fit in m pocket when I go out. I can now read menu's in a restaurant
customer_reviews.author: Pamela George

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for books and anything flat. not good for taking in the store to help with labels.
customer_reviews.author: B. Spell

customer_reviews.title: This item is excellent. We purchased it to replace an older scanner
customer_reviews.text: This item is excellent. We purchased it to replace an older scanner. This has great quality and is much lighter. Greatly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Chininin

customer_reviews.title: This product has made my clients life easier, important ...
customer_reviews.text: This product has made my clients life easier, important materials he could not see before without help are now accessible and available. This product allows him to be much more independent.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Voc Rehab

customer_reviews.title: Great product for someone who has low vision
customer_reviews.text: This electronic magnifier is easy to use especially for someone who has low vision. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Instructions written in poor English. Device too expensive for its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Works great and small enough to take with her
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife with low vision.Works great and small enough to take with her.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged, and product as described. Much clearer than a traditional magnifying glass.
customer_reviews.author: Adel Ali

customer_reviews.title: very useful he uses it daily
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my father who has Macula degeneration, very useful he uses it daily. Practical. The only thing he complains about is that can not read color prints. I think is the way we set it up. I have to check instruction, probable we r not using it right. I definetely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: lourdes cohen

customer_reviews.title: It would be better if Koolertron starts from 2X
customer_reviews.text: My grandfather said 4X is too big for him. It would be better if Koolertron starts from 2X. Other than that, he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the poor quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Item has flaws in the operation. The selection buttons (contacts) operate intermittently and the unit itself does not provide all of the color schemes stated. Provides challenging operation for a sighted individual, near impossible for someone visually challenged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not quite good enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom with macular degeneration. I thought it was really cool. My mom hates it and won't use. I' returning it.she said it moves to fast and much. the ad made it sound easier to use than it actually is. I would have given it more time to adjust but my mom was not willing to spend money on something she felt she can use. so i give it 4 * but my gives it 1 * so I'll rate it atg
customer_reviews.author: Ranza

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Happy with all of my five star items Happy happy happy
customer_reviews.author: BRENDA C. POSTELL

customer_reviews.title: I hated it personally
customer_reviews.text: IT ONLY MAGNIFIES ABOUT TWO WORDS AT A TIME IN ITS TINY 1"-WIDE VIEWING AREA/WINDOW. TO READ A BOOK, YOU HAVE TO KEEP MOVING IT LEFT AND RIGHT CONSTANTLY. -- NOT PERFECTED YET. I gave it away to my Son's friend who has VERRRRRRRRY limited eyesight. I hated it personally.
customer_reviews.author: Value-tique, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Small buttons on device
customer_reviews.text: From the reviews and specs, I thought the device would be a perfect gift for my father who is losing his vision. Unfortunately, the buttons were too small. Upon first use, my father was unable to find and turn on the device. After some guided practice, he still struggled. It was enough of an issue for him to say that he was not planning on using the magnifier.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my 79 year old dad
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. Excellent product. Works great. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. English

customer_reviews.title: Magnifier
customer_reviews.text: Excellent transaction. Only suggestion would be a crush proof case. Individual purchased for has had stroke affecting his right hand, tends to lose control of what he's holding.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia M. Getz

customer_reviews.title: Quality is what I look for
customer_reviews.text: I gave as a gift to my sister who has a limited vision. She liked so much.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Camera

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This product works as advertised. Just as good as the electronic magnifier; a couple hundred dollars less.
customer_reviews.author: Coach

customer_reviews.title: Best we have found
customer_reviews.text: By far the best we have found. Only complaint is it is a bit heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Does not have advertised multiple color modes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular machine because it was advertised to have multiple color mode feature. It did not and when I sent email to seller to ask about that I got no response.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for those with low vision problems
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and affordable device to assist people with low, near vision problems. Easy to operation and allows for reverse contrast viewing at the user's discretion.
customer_reviews.author: Johnsbird

customer_reviews.title: magnifier
customer_reviews.text: this was a nice magnifier till I had to charge it. Now the screen does not come on. This is the second one I have purchased and neither one has lasted for the amount of money I have spent on them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Watlington

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: CANT GET IT OPEN WAY TOO COMPLICATED SENDING BACK IMMEDIATELY
customer_reviews.author: Susan Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Poor screen functions and battery life
customer_reviews.text: Does not Hold freeze screen long enough to use a phone number, changes to time and day screen in the middle of reading, turns off too soon , short-lived battery , I sent mine back it’s too expensive for the quality
customer_reviews.author: wilderness

customer_reviews.title: It is great fro reading the newspaper
customer_reviews.text: This product works perfectly and as described. It is great fro reading the newspaper, an article or small medicine labels. We would purchases again.
customer_reviews.author: DrWasaki

customer_reviews.title: limited instructions unable to contact manufacture to get help magnification ...
customer_reviews.text: limited instructions unable to contact manufacture to get help magnification blurry. focal length to long for a 90 year old aunt to read a book
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, poor performance.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. My son purchased this item as a gift for my husband who is visually impaired. The magnifier does not hold a charge, it turns off when in use and is useless for distant viewing. It was very difficult to return the item as it was through a third party seller. All and all a poor experience
customer_reviews.author: doc

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT work at all and very difficult to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 94 year old blind (with AMD) mother and could not get it to work at all!! Sent it back very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Bergmann

product_meta.title: Koolertron 5.0 inch Handheld Portable Video Digital Magnifier Mobile Electronic Reading Aid with Multiple Color Modes, Rechargeable Battery Powered, Freeze etc
product_meta.description:
Note: People with severely impaired vision are not recommended to buy.If you have any problem with the item ,pls feel free to contact us.we will do our best to help you!

1.Turn on the Power Key,then Press blue button (Distance Key)，Light at the back of the device on, enters close view mode for reading, light off,distant view mode for distant vision. if used to reading in distant vision mode,fuzzy snowflakes would be on LED display
2.Adopts the design of intelligent province electricity, if the picture without operation, automatic will shutdown after 2 minutes. It is environmental protection and energy saving.If you want to avoid, can move it within 2 min. 

Specifications:
High speed 60fps, smart calculation, no stops, enjoy relax reading
Double camera design, get view both far and near
Screen freeze, Accurate reading
Key data storage automatically, play and view whenever you need
Electronic curtain, avoid light interference
Voice reminder , simple operation
Backlight brightness, light intensity adjustment
Flashlight, offer temporary lighting
Removable great capacity battery, save power intelligently(continuous working up to 4 hours, no further operation of button up to 2 min, it turns off automatically)
Super thin portable visual aids, support handle function
Offer relax reading experience, fluent handwriting
HDMI 1080i60 output, connection to HD TV, enjoy big screen
Support music play function, with it, elder and low vision ones can also enjoy the relax and happy reading during drinking tea, no problem anymore.

Package Included:
1 x 5.0 Inch Digital Magnifier Electronic Reading Aid
1 x Video Output Cable
1 x HDMI Cable
1 x Rechargeable Batteries
1 x Flannelette Bag (Random Color)
1 x Cleaner Wipe Cloth (Random Color)
1 x Lanyard
1 x English User Manual
feature_bullets: Battery: Rechargeable batteries（2500mah). working for last 4 Hours (no further operation of button up to 2 min, it turns off automatically)
Weight: 250g (including battery),Dimensions: 150 mm x 84 mm x 30 mm
HDMI 1080i60 output, connection to HD TV
Suitable for : cataract, glaucoma, macular degeneration, optic atrophy, retinopathy, high myopia, congenital cataract, nystagmus, albinism, elder man who is in low vision
